items.sentence: Tom isn't the only one here who drinks tea.
Are you thinking of anything in particular?
Let's not let them get too far ahead of us.
Let's not forget to thank Tom for his help.
I'll never make that kind of mistake again.
I'm only going to speak French from now on.
How many children were playing in the park?
French is a required subject at our school.
Why don't we see if they'll let us do that?
Why don't we go sailing tomorrow afternoon?
I think that Tom knows about John and Mary.
Tom thinks that Mary will do that for John.
Tom wasn't surprised Mary didn't like John.
Tom promised he'd drop by for a visit soon.
It seems like all Tom cares about is money.
We've spent all the money that was donated.
Doing that could take up to thirty minutes.
That could take up to thirty minutes to do.
Please give me a couple of slices of bread.
I study history harder than I study French.
In my free time, I like listening to music.
Only some of us here can understand French.
I never have enough time to do my homework.
Do you actually think I'm going to do that?
Is there anything you want to do right now?
What makes you think I'm going to help you?
Hey, where do you think you're taking that?
Hey, I'm the one who should be apologizing.
I enjoyed working with Tom on that project.
How do you know I'm not the one who did it?
I want to know what it is I'm getting into.
I want to get out here as soon as possible.
I want to finish this job so I can go home.
I want to thank you for what you did today.
Thank you for all the help you've given us.
I don't think any of those are what I need.
I don't want you to think I'm dissatisfied.
I've never been more scared in all my life.
I don't know how much more time it'll take.
I don't want to cause you any more trouble.
I recommend that you don't do that anymore.
I'm getting too old for this sort of thing.
I'm not allowed to have visitors this week.
I have a feeling you're going to like this.
I'd feel a lot better if we didn't do that.
I've never seen Tom with that woman before.
There's no question that Tom was the thief.
That's a question that only Tom can answer.
Even Tom thinks that the price is too high.
Tom never gave in to me that easily before.
